title: Fallen
description: Makayla Brooks finds herself in the trunk of a car. She had been kidnapped... Her fear too real, especially when the car pulled over and her captor opened the boot. Once her eyes were able to adjust to the light she looked at the man looking down at her... She knew him... He was not her captor, he was her saviour... Her was her father's guard, had guarded her family for years, her secret crush... But her relief was short lived... Her would be hero was not there to rescue her this time... The opposite actually, he was there to hurt her.  Warning: This book is recommended for readers 18 years and over. It contains sex and submission and violence.
author: E.L. Beth
